SELECT ts.`name` AS singerName, tm.id AS musicId, tm.musicName, tm.resume, tm.compose, img.path AS image, aud.path AS audio FROM t_singer ts LEFT JOIN t_music_connect_singer tmcs ON ts.id = tmcs.singerId LEFT JOIN t_music tm ON tmcs.musicId = tm.id LEFT JOIN t_image_database img ON tm.imageId = img.id LEFT JOIN t_audio_database aud ON tm.audioId = aud.id
AND tmcs.singerId = #{singerId}

SELECT COUNT(*) FROM t_singer ts LEFT JOIN t_music_connect_singer tmcs ON ts.id = tmcs.singerId LEFT JOIN t_music tm ON tmcs.musicId = tm.id
AND tmcs.singerId = #{singerId}

SELECT ts.`name` AS singerName, tm.musicName AS musicName, tm.compose AS compose, tid.path AS imagePath FROM t_music tm LEFT JOIN t_music_connect_singer tmcs ON tm.id = tmcs.musicId LEFT JOIN t_singer ts ON tmcs.singerId = ts.id LEFT JOIN t_image_database tid ON tm.imageId = tid.id
AND tm.id = #{musicId}
